title: Exlclusive land overlooking gregory lake
details:
Location -Nuwaraeliya Upperlake Moon Plains (5minutes to Gregory lake )
Extent -296 Perches
Ownership -(PVT one owner Clear deeds which is very rare in nuwaraeliya )
Height restriction -G+3 (approval received which is very rare normally its G+1)
Soil -best soil for developments (NBRO confirmed )
Entrance -20 ft road to the door step
Block shape -perfect square block
View -360 degree view ,overlooking the gregory lake
Special feature - Flat Land

Asking price per perch -1000000 LKR
